    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String pseudo,
            java.lang.String password,
            java.lang.String email)
     throws InputSyntaxException
        Instantiates an non-admin User object using given arguments. First verify if pseudo, password and email each fit their own syntax pattern. Password is hashed. Sets default values to 0.
        Parameters:
        pseudo - String, the user pseudo.
        password - String, the user password.
        email - String, the user email.
        Throws:
        InputSyntaxException - When the user's input does not fit the relevant pattern.

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String pseudo,
            java.lang.String password,
            java.lang.String email,
            boolean admin)
     throws InputSyntaxException
        Instantiates an User object using given arguments. First verify if pseudo, password and email each fit their own syntax pattern. Password is hashed. Sets default values to 0.
        Parameters:
        pseudo - String, the user pseudo.
        password - String, the user password.
        email - String, the user email.
        admin - boolean, if the user is an admin.
        Throws:
        InputSyntaxException
        See Also:
        User(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, boolean)

        public void hashPassword()

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(java.lang.String password)
                 throws InputSyntaxException
        Sets a new password to the user, only if it fits the syntax pattern. Hash the password using SHA-256 algorithm before setting it's new value.
        Parameters:
        password - String, the user field.
        Throws:
        InputSyntaxException - When the given password doesn't fit it's syntax pattern.
        See Also:
        getHashedPassword(String password)

      • numberPartiesLost

        public int numberPartiesLost()
        Returns the number of parties lost by the user. If result is lower than 0, returns -1.
        Returns:
        int, partiesPlayed field minus partiesWon field.
